name: OR_LNLG_SLN_BED
description: This table contains information on sentinel lymph node bed readings.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SENTINEL_LYMPH_NODE_BED
columns.description: Which sentinel lymph node bed is being documented on

columns.name: SLN_BED_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Where the sentinel lymph node bed is on the patient

columns.name: SLN_HOT_SPOT_READING
columns.description: Reading of the sentinel lymph node bed hot spot

columns.name: SLN_BED_READING
columns.description: Reading of the sentinel lymph node bed after incision
